tool_description: Cleans and normalizes text content by removing unwanted characters, normalizing whitespace, and preparing text for chunking.

text_content.description: The raw text content to preprocess

preserve_newlines.description: Whether to preserve original line breaks

error_messages: Empty text content: Provide non-empty text content for preprocessing.
Invalid format type: Format type must be one of [plain_text, markdown, html, json, xml].
usage: Provide text_content and format_type, optionally configure preprocessing options. Returns cleaned text ready for chunking.

cleaned_text.description: The preprocessed and cleaned text content

original_length.description: Length of original text in characters

cleaned_length.description: Length of cleaned text in characters
